subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Heather O’Reilly scored off a rebound in the 34th minute, helping the United States beat China, 1-0, at Ford Field in Detroit. The victory gave the United States a record of 33-1-2 for 2008, extending its record for wins in a calendar year. The Americans won 28 of 34 matches in 2004.
